short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects Ethereum addresses and displays basic stats and a link to Etherscan.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EtherLens is a Chrome extension that enables users to quickly access Ethereum address information, such as balance and Etherscan details, by simply hovering over an Ethereum address on any webpage. This extension saves time and improves productivity for users who frequently work with Ethereum addresses.
